abstract: The Council of Institutional Investors has asked the Securities and Exchange Commission to intervene after Broadridge, main company that provides real-time tabulations on shareholder votes, stopped providing such information to the groups that sponsor proposals.

headline.main: Investor Group Asks S.E.C. to Intervene on Access to Shareholder Vote Totals

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Securities Industry and Financial Markets Assn

byline.original: By Susanne Craig and Jessica Silver-Greenberg
